md:
giải nghĩa từ "cou" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Cou (n) - một con bò, một con vật nuôi

* Meaning: A cow is a domesticated mammal that is often kept on farms and ranches for its milk and meat.
* Example sentence: The farmer owns a few cows on his farm.
* Related words: bull, cattle, livestock, farm
* Antonyms: none

Cou (v) - để ghép, để kết hợp

* Meaning: To couple means to join or connect two things together.
* Example sentence: The engineer had to couple the two machines together to make them work efficiently.
* Related words: join, connect, link, unite
* Antonyms: uncouple, separate, disconnect

Cou (n) - một cặp, một đôi

* Meaning: A couple is two people who are in a romantic relationship or two things that are together.
* Example sentence: The couple went on a romantic dinner date.
* Related words: pair, duo, twosome, partners
* Antonyms: single, solo, individual

Note: The meaning of "cou" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.
